/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with lush green trees and towering buildings, creating a harmonious blend of nature and architecture. Cars and motorcycles, indicative of the city's active transportation, are scattered along the road, adding to the dynamic atmosphere. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a serene backdrop to the urban landscape. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene and highlighting the vibrant colors of the cityscape.
